class_description:
This class specifies the set of parameters used with password-based
 encryption (PBE), as defined in the
 PKCS #5
 standard.

params.param_description:
the salt. The contents of salt are copied
 to protect against subsequent modification.

Methods.method_description:
Constructs a parameter set for password-based encryption as defined in
 the PKCS #5 standard.

params.param_description:
the salt. The contents of salt are copied
 to protect against subsequent modification.

the cipher algorithm parameter specification, which
 may be null.

Methods.method_description:
Constructs a parameter set for password-based encryption as defined in
 the PKCS #5 standard.

return_description: the parameter specification, or null if none was set.

Methods.method_description: Returns the cipher algorithm parameter specification.

return_description:
the salt. Returns a new array
 each time this method is called.
